front.title: IEEE Standard for Information technology-- Local and metropolitan area networks-- Specific requirements-- Part 15.4: Amendment 2: Alternative Physical Layer Extension to support one or more of the Chinese 314-316 MHz, 430-434 MHz, and 779-787 MHz bands

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment defines alternate PHY and modifications to the MAC needed to support the PHY that complies with the applicable Chinese regulations, Radio Management of P. R. of China doc. # 6326360786867187500 or current document, for one or more of the 314-316 MHz, 430-434 MHz, and 779-787 MHz frequency bands.
